actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Indian Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 95-239.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce, H. Rept. 95-1306.
Measure called up by consent calendar in House.

official_title: An Act to declare that certain lands of the United States situated in the State of Oklahoma are held by the United States in trust for the Cheyenne-Arapaho Tribes of Oklahoma, and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept conveyance from the Cheyenne-Arapaho Tribes of Oklahoma of certain other lands in Oklahoma to be held in trust by the United States for such tribes.

summary.text: Declares that certain lands of the United States situated in the State of Oklahoma are held in trust by the United States for the Cheyenne- Arapaho Tribes of Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain lands of the US situated in the state of Oklahoma are held by the US in trust for the Cheyenne- Arapaho.

An Act to declare that certain lands of the United States situated in the State of Oklahoma are held by the United States in trust for the Cheyenne-Arapaho Tribes of Oklahoma, and to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept conveyance from the Cheyenne-Arapaho Tribes of Oklahoma of certain other lands in Oklahoma to be held in trust by the United States for such tribes.
